job description:
Data Analyst for a major Oil & Gas company. Responsibilities:
  • Importing, cleansing, validating, and analyzing data
  • Utilizing analytic and data visualization tools to summarize and illustrate data • Maintaining large, confidential or complex data files
  • Communicating and distributing statistical findings to various audiences through charts, graphs and other visual content for reports and presentations
Requirements:
  • 3+ years' data analysis experience in oil & gas/chemical/energy industry
Skills:
  • Proficient in MS Office
  • SAP experience is preferred
  • Report generation and data analysis
  • Strong analytical, verbal and written communication skills
General:
  • $25-32/hr
  • Stability, long term position
  • Global organization
  • Access to onsite perks (i.e. recreational center, dining options, dry cleaning, etc)
